name: BogSack
description:
WASD controls, if your keyboard doesn't support it I don't care...

Collect coins and dodge the enemies.

Level 50 you win!!!

At Level 100 you unlock the true guy but that s*** is hard so you win at 50:/

BOG: is the red dude he follows you.

SNAKE: is the green long dude he just vibes and wanders .

CHEESE: throws baseballs randomly and wanders around.

SACK: basically moves due to a physics bug so he kind of op sometimes but you get used to him if you play long enough which you probably wont because this game sucks bogsack!

(Everything past score 100 is developed after the game jams deadline, I had too much fun and wanted to add more!)

SQUID: shoots ink that homes towards and and wanders randomly.

VIRUS: defends the coin.
